name: Centers for International Business Education
objective: To provide a comprehensive university approach to improve the teaching of international business by bringing together faculty from numerous disciplines and to engage in research to promote the international competitiveness of U.S. business.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

authorizations.text: VI, B, 612, Higher Education Act of 1965, as amended.

rules_regulations: The Education Department General Administrative Regulations.
